verses.roman:
āji ye haila āmāra baḍa-i vipatti
tāhā haite kaile tumi āmāra avyāhati"

synonyms: āji—today; ye—that which; haila—happened; āmāra—My; baḍa-i—very great; vipatti—obstacle; tāhā—that danger; haite—from; kaile—did; tumi—you; āmāra—My; avyāhati—relief.
translation: "The incident that happened today was a great obstacle for Me, but you have kindly relieved Me of it."
